name: New Thought Bulletin (IAPSOP)
content:
New Thought Bulletin (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: New Thought Bulletin Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: New Thought Bulletin, The. Keep Thy Imagination With All Diligence For Out of It Are the Issues of Life / You can Achieve in Your Life Anything You Can Conceive in Your Heart Other titles: International New Thought Bulletin / New Thought Quarterly / New Thought 1916—1950 Monthly, quarterly (1941; varies) Hollywood, CA, then Washington D.C., then Mesa, AZ. Publisher: New Thought Alliance / International New Thought Alliance. Succeeded by: New Thought (Mesa and Scottsdale, AZ) 1/1, 1916-1950. $1.00, 26pp. Organizational bulletin of the activities of the NTA/INTA, with occasional articles on New Thought. LOC; Union Theological Seminary; Graduate Theological Union Library; Southern Methodist University; Alliance for Higher Education (Texas); NYPL. Issues:New Thought Bulletin V16 N5 May 1931 New Thought Bulletin V19 N6 Aug 1934
